## Which specification?

<!-- e.g. spec/001-health-asset.md, spec/002-consent-protocol.md -->

**Spec file**:
**Section / line**:

## Type of feedback

- [ ] Ambiguity — the spec could be read multiple ways
- [ ] Gap — a case is not addressed
- [ ] Contradiction — two parts of the spec conflict
- [ ] Improvement — a design suggestion
- [ ] Typo / editorial

<!-- What is the issue? Be specific. Quote the relevant text if applicable. -->
